content.detailedDescription:
On oct.11, 2014 at approximately 6:55 p.S.T. in 
huntington beach, ca., my girlfriend and i observed (for the 3rd or 4th time, my first time reporting),a larger bright orange colored object in the sky looking approximately sw. (i used an electronic compass "app" downloaded to my tablet to determine direction of object). she and i were in our condo complex parking lot retrieving items from my car when she noticed it and told me to take pictures. this object would be over the pacific ocean which is located approx. 1 mile from my location.

"what did you think the object was?" -

since this was about the 4th time we saw this in the same vicinity,we tried to speculate what it was. we are located in a flight path where planes take off and land at lax, (36 miles from my location), long beach airport, (17 miles),
john wayne airport,(9 miles), and ontario airport, (56 miles). having been here 6 years, i'm used to seeing planes in their usual flight paths and altitudes as well as police helicopters. additionally, planes and helicopters observed seemed to always have the same colors and direction of movement. we speculated the possibility of planes or helicopters but the movements, altitude, and color of lights weren't consistent with with what we've observed several times prior. we also discussed the possibility of a balloon, rc drone, and military aircraft. to my knowledge, i'm not aware of any military bases currently in operation in my vicinity with the exception of mira mar located in san diego located down the coastline approximately 75 miles from my location.

"describe object movement and motions in detail" - 

this object moved up and down, stays in one position,and side to side. from the photos, it appears to be rotating. the elevation appeared from my vantage point to be higher than where planes are normally witnessed in their flight paths but this varies +/- unknown elevations.
there was medium cloud cover this evening so it would disappear behind clouds and re-appear nearby the same location through cloud breaks. 

"describe your feelings" - fascinated,curious, not shocked because we've seen this object (or similar object) before so we keep an eye out for it randomly.

"how did you lose sight"- cloud cover.

please note that some photos submitted were zoomed and cropped to obtain better view of object. also, pictures may show a street lamps orange light towards the bottom of the photos.
content.summary: Glowing orange color, very bright, seems to hover and rotate.

content.detailedDescription: On october 9,2014, early thursday evening around 7:08 pm. i witnessed a bright orb directly above where i was sitting on my porch. i had my camcorder with me and was able to video this bright white orb moving slowly towards owens mountain.  i recorded the object until it went out.  when i went inside to review the recording, i saw a second orb leave the first orb.  that right there shocked me! what object does that, that i know of, none!
content.summary: Bright orb with second orb leaving it

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch when i saw a white light above pikes peak. as i watched, it rose up, and started getting brighter (for about one second), then less bright. when it started to descend, i saw another one, lower than the first. the first light seemed to hover near a cloud, then i lost it, and the other one. within a minute or two, i found it again, it did the same thing, rising and getting brighter then less bright. this time, it continued to ascend until i could not see it anymore. i have video, but did not catch the part where the lights got brighter. i can't attach video because my computer is down, and i am using someone else's computer to report.
content.summary: Light rising over pike's peak getting brighter, then less bright, and descending, second light appeared, acted similar

content.detailedDescription:
Object travelled across the sky with an orange glow with what appeared to be flames being emitted. there was no noise whatsoever. this flew over the town center of middleborough, massachusetts on october 11, 2014 at approximately 6:55pm est. it was flying much too fast to be a hot air balloon. i estimate the altitude to be at least 2k to 5k feet. there was almost no wind at ground level and the ambient temperature was 46f.
witnesses: van jabagjorian, brian jabagjorian, marc daniel jabagjorian
direction of travel: south south-east
content.summary: Flaming glowing orange object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i, (i am a retired police officer), and two friends had just come out of a restaurant .. this was at about 2220 hrs.  and were walking towards the avenida de liberdade, on the north side of the river. we were approximately opposite the large "christ statue". we saw an elderly man who was clearly fishing at the bank. his rod was at rest. he seemed very exciteable, pointing up towards the sky. he shouted, in portuguese, and i am not good with portuguese, the other three are portuguese; he said "the portuguese airforce has just headed that way",pointing south across the river. he said 20 planes, had "gone to bomb syria". when we heard that we all laughed at him. i remember three or four dutch or german middle aged people had stopped, and asked in english what had just happened. i said, "that man has had a little bit too much aguadente!" they walked on, as did we. but about 50 yards further on, one of us (i think it was me who first saw it), told the others to "turn around and look up". what we all saw was the most extraordinary sight any of us have ever seen. a young portuguese couple were also present and were also stood still and looking up. now, all of us, us four anyway, would all independantly pass a polygraph test... any time, any place. to continue, what i saw (we saw) were a large amount of "craft" in the sky about between 1,000 and 2,000 feet up, maybe 2,000 to 3,000 feet away. it was so very clear. some of them appeared to hover for a while, others moved up and down, there appeared to be lateral distance between them all, but this was very much a formation. i do not believe i am writing this. i wish i wasn't. i say that one or two of them had a purple and green light in the middle. the others say they cannot recall that. they were all a diamond shape, from my memory, and all were outlined with a white light, light small white lights around the edges. one of my friends, both us citizens and responsible people with responsible jobs, thought that the objects were small "drones". however, they were all noiseless. and my view is that, with the distance from us, they would be the size of a saloon car each. the sky in front of us was filled with them. perhaps you have seen this before? i don't buy that drone idea, because military drones cost millions of pounds each, don't they? and 60 of them? i don't think so!. besides, the jerky up and down movement of some of them ... i think if it was drones they would have risked crashing. no they were not drones. the only other possibility was that it was some kind of projection onto the sky in front of us as a prank. but, we asked ourselves that question as it unfolded. we saw no beams of light from ground to sky. besides, the spread of these "craft" covered a wide area: too wide to be a projection. it all seemed very real to us. we were so gobsmacked that not one of us thought to take a photograph. we regret that. the craft were moving deliberately south across the river. i saw an airliner crossing, much higher than "them" heading south to north and crossing the river. i watched it and i tried to judge how quickly these silent craft were moving. they were much more fluid in movement and much much quicker than that aircraft. this whole thing seemed to last an eternity. i have no idea who the other couple were. we did not think to get their names. we have tried telling others of what we saw, but they too think we must have been drinking. yet we were all stone cold sober. i pass it on to you because it was too unusual a sight to simply ignore. as it unfolded, i turned to my friend, and i distinctly recall saying to him, "are we being invaded j**n". he replied, something like, what the hell is that. please e mail us whenever you like. i am sure that if you are a legitimate researcher then the others would not mind you having their email addresses. but i will wait to see if any of this is of interest to you. i would be even more pleased if you could offer me a rational explanation for this. thanks. lastly, and i have not mentioned this to the others, but i saw a smaller plane, climbing from a low altitude, already on the south side of the river, and it climbed into the clouds over there. i saw the, what i think is, the rear exhaust of the engine? and this was when the old man was speaking to us. only because at that early stage he was pointing south and we were looking. 
eventually all of these "craft" shot off across the river, and disappeared into the clouds on the south side. on our side of the river, the night was clear and crisp. i didn't see any cloud on our side. all the best.
content.summary: Over 40 craft in formation observed by 7 people covering quite a large area . 2,00 feet away.

content.detailedDescription: I was about to go out onto the balcony for a cigarette and as soon as i stepped outside i observed around 10-15 glowing orbs ranging from red, yellow, green and blue. i had no idea what they could be and called my girlfriend to quickly come and look who also saw them until they were out of sight. the light flew / floated from left to right ober quite a large distance before vanishing out of sight behind the trees and depth of sight. we both have no idea what we saw and are overwhelmed. the video and pictures are not the best. taken with iphone 5c.
content.summary: Glowing orbs over hamburg germany

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back patio had just phoned my dad in nevada, as soon as i sat down i saw a bright light slowly moving towards me, i told my dad and immediately called my daughter from inside the house.

she came out and wanted the binoculars i keep right inside the door she looked and clearly saw the object which i was describing to my dad and i was telling him about all the crazy things i have observed since i moved in.  my daughter told me it was a triangle and to look at it.

i told her its not a triangle i can see its. just a light , i absolutely cannot explaon why i didnt look through the binoculars and have her talk to my dad, i will never get over that as long as i live.

anyway we watched it until it slowly blinked out which we have both seen many times before. the total time of the viewing was three minutes estimated which we both thought was how long the duration of the sighting was.

later on i asked jer about it after my call with my dad, which was over two hours. when she told me exactly what she saw which was a triangle shape with three large round white lights i was stunned, told her if that ever happens again to grab me, shake me and force me to look through the binoculars. i dont talk to my dad too often is my only possible reason for my more than dumb answer when she told me it was a triangle and handed me the binoculars.

anyway shes a lucky young woman and she was pretty excited about it.
content.summary: I first witnessed low flying bright light, when viewed through binoculars by my daughter was clearly a triangle shape  with round lights

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out of my patio window and saw what appeared to be a hovering fireball or object round in shape, that was seen in the southern sky south of kalamazoo, mi. i thought it might be an incoming plane but there were no planes in the area and it never moved enough to suggest it could be a plane.
it hovered low in the horizon and did appear to be moving only slightly. it wasn't perfectly still but you could tell it was slightly moving. i used the term fireball but it could have been a mass of lights, orang/red in color appearing at a distance as a fireball. i tried to take a pic but it was too far away. it wasn't a chinese lantern, but based on the distance and how big it still appeared, it had to have been huge. i checked flightradar(ios app) and there were no flights at all in the area. after hovering for about 15 mins approx 9:30pm it was gone. i did check the internet for similar sightings and there have been sightings like this in this area.
content.summary: Hovering ball of light over kalamazoo

content.detailedDescription:
Taking care of my bee hive.
just look up in the in the sky.
airplane.
content.summary: Light streak in sky [title added by cms/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the cluster of lights on 10/7/14 at about 2 a.M. i was about to go to bed and went to close the door to my balcony. i noticed that it was a beautiful clear night so i looked around for a moment. when i looked to the north i saw at a high altitude a cluster of lights.There seemed to be a white, red and blueish lights clustered together with another white light slightly above and to the right of the others.They were stationary but also seemed to move slightly. there was no sound but i didn't expect to hear any as the lights were as i said at a high altitude.I was convinced that i was observing a ufo so i got a small light device and perhaps foolishly began signaling the lights by flashing in a series of prime numbers. it seemed to react by rotating for a moment but after a short time i got bored and went to bed. i left the curtains open and lay in bed facing the door to my balcony. to my amazement and concern t watched as the lights appeared in my line of vision,moved to the center of the door, then remained stationary again. i had the distinct feeling that i had made contact and that i was now being observed. i tried signaling again with my light but got no observable response. after a time i guess i fell asleep. i have observed it on the nineth and the tenth at around the same time and in the same initial location but could not signal it as i seemed to have misplaced the light i was using. it was only on the first night that i saw it move.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: 1. im working in shop on this street. i go outside from shoop and see what one star lighting much powerfull then rest small stars. after i change my place and i see what ufo changing place too relatively near objects. then i understand what its not star. first i thinks what this is helicopter, but its not fly, not change directions and freezing more then 2 hours. i back to shop and get my dvd camera with tripod. i setup tripod and start recording object. after when i back to shop for charging battery and back outside object has gone.
content.summary: Its appeared when in kyiv on center goverment kill peaples on meeting.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my home, and at approx.7:50 p.M. on october 8th 2014. my wife was in our back yard on phone w/our daughter. i then heard dogs barking and stepped out to see why. as i took about six steps to reach my drive-way which has a incline to my garage where my wife was, i looked up and immediately observed (2)bright objects, one a little bit ahead of the other  heading directly north. at first i thought it was two shooting stars but then realized they were moving too slow. i then excitedly called out to my wife (who was in deep conversation with my daughter) to "look_up!! can you see them"? she was closer to the garage than i was and did not have the open view that i had. the sky was clear! she looked at me and then moved closer to my position to try to see what i was seeing (her night eye sight is not what it used to be), and by the time she had the right direction these bright twin objects had  turned to a  ne direction at what i feel is a unbelievable speed. my total view time i est. to be 18 seconds. these objects were actually crossing the normal airline flight path that i feel was unusual in itself.
content.summary: There were objects above as i going outside to see why dogs were barking, i observed one slightly ahead of the other heading north then then turned no. e very fast.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i will watch planes frequently at san jose international airport take off and land as a form of relaxing entertainment. he tends to take his nikon coolpix p7700 out to take pictures of the different planes landing or of interesting clouds that form in the area. on this night, september 20th, 2014 we were enjoying a picnic dinner while watching. suddenly we noticed a break in the planes. there had been so many coming and going, but then it got quiet... nothing even in the skies around the airport. we thought it to be strange so we just waited. he decided to get a continuous shot (group of 6) of the buses across the airport from us as an nfl team was coming in for a 49er game soon. during this time, there was absolutely no planes on or near the taxi area or air strips. about 10-15 minutes went by (roughly) when planes suddenly started taking off and landing again like crazy! we thought it was odd, but joked that traffic control may have been busy talking to pilots at another smaller local airport. we got home that night and just continued on with life as normal. well... my husband was reviewing the pictures from that night just a few hours ago and noticed a circular shape object with a top dome light, windows, a red tail, white front lights and a grey base color to it! its very odd, in these 6 continuous shots (taken at about 1/10/second speed each), you can clearly make out this object moving just a few feet above ground across the center runway (airstrip) in the opposite direction that the planes were coming in at! it never changes shape, and keeps on a straight pattern. the only thing that changes in any of these photos is the color of the light on the dome portion of the top of the object. we never saw this to our naked eye, and never heard any unusual sounds. there was no unusual activity after the event either, that we saw. there were no helicopters, or anything else except normal commercial planes coming and going. we have zoomed in and looked closely at these images where you can see great details. to us, its irrefutable proof that ufo's do exist. there's no way to deny it.
content.summary: Object at san jose international airport

content.detailedDescription: It was 12:00 am i had just finished washing dishes and wanted to relax for a couple minutes before going to bed.Went outside to look at full moon sat down and was just chilling.I am not sure when i noticed the blinking it was coming from my left and really resembled a few stars in a triangular pattern.Yet it seemed to be coming closer to me but still far off 2 or 3 miles maybe.The sky was totally clear the eclipse happened later in the morning.I am not sure how long it took but they broke off into a line and moved to the north of my house. where they reformed in a triangular pattern,still seemed to be far away.It was then that it seemed to change shape yet still remained triangular stretching out while pulsating and vibrating?The orbs stayed white but it looked like light was pulsating between them to form a full triangle.Inside it looked like you could see the sky  but not really,like it was cloacking in the center.I had an odd thought at the time had they opened a portal? at some point there were many more that showed up most at a great distance and acting similarly.I kind of felt mesmerized?Or hypnotized? time was odd,hard to describe.I had grabbed my camera sometime before 1:00am and kept thinking i should wake my husband and son.Was certain it would be gone before they could get outside so i did'nt wake them but started taking pictures sadly i did'nt know how to use the video mode.The pictures i got are weird in quite a few ways.Quite a few look black and i kept thinking its not working right.But it was like whatever is in the center of frame disappeared making space around it darker on close inspection there are orbs or stars in most of those pictures.The third picture i took is black yet at top of frame a grayish shadow of an orb is seen.All these pictures were taken with a fuji xp camera on telephoto unsure of specs but is fairly new and has wifi.In hind sight that photo really bothers me as i had not seen anything this close visually.On the blackened photos i never lost sight of the lights.There are a couple pictures in my set of 20 that the date is upside down as if i had turned camera i had not.The 5th frame is the view as it looked to me when they were'nt throbbing,morphing and elongating.I did not see all those that i got on film but did notice that the light seemed odd.The flash at the left in pic.#5 is from a basketball backboard.It was a full moon and it was brighter but this was different,indescribable.The 6th frame is similar only center is'nt what i saw visually as lights never left my site.During the time i was taking pictures the flash seemed to draw them closer in and i was getting paranoid so did'nt take as many as i wanted to,especially when i thought the camera was malfunctioning.I turned back to the south and took 2 pictures of the moon there it worked fine,next picture i had turned back to the north when that one was shot the camera was not turned upside down but the picture seems to have been taken that way.Took 2 more pictures of what seemed to be nothing so i walked inside and took a picture of my dog tony.Camera worked fine for him went back outside took 2 more of what i thought was blackness same as the others on closer inspection there are orbs/lights/stars in most of these pictures.I felt like it was not going to let me film it any longer so quit taking pictures and shortly there after went to bed.I never did wake my husband or son but knew they would be getting up before too long so left camera and a note on kitchen table about my strange pictures asking them to get pictures of the eclipse.There are 3 pictures of that and you can see orbs/lights in those they were taken to the west,off our deck.The next night i took pictures in the same spot but only to the south and east just as a comparison.That is a picture of a plane just to the left of the moon.The next frame is black in that series too did not see anything weird though.   overall the experience left me stoked and excited but in hind sight a bit paranoid as i've been left with the feeling that we are probably being watched more frequently than we care to know.And i am left wondering if there was more to my interaction with these lights as time and reality seemed to be altered somehow.I am pretty sure that they accessed my camera through its wifi but cannot say for sure how the pictures were messed with.  the experience lasted a little less than 2 hours yet i was surprised to see i took pictures for only 50 minutes of that time.When i was a kid about 1977 a group of neighborhood kids probably 9or10 of us were playing hide and go seek and we all had an experience with lights. they would stay in a line formation probably 7 or so lights about 5miles away at a sixty degree angle and would move strangely enough at high speeds that we knew what we saw was other worldly even then.I guess that might be why i never really was afraid but did get paranoid the other night when the flashes from the camera drew them closer to me than i wanted them to be.I could not post all the pictures i referred to so am sending 1,3,5,6,9,14,16,21 in the series i took on 10/08/2014.The 9th file was the eclipse taken at5:50 am on10/08/2014.10th file is taken on 10/09/2014 showing a plane in approximate area lights formed the night before.
content.summary: Lights appearing in triangular form while watching full moon.Moving,morphing changing form and altering pics taken of them.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling down highway 58 after dinner. all of a sudden a craft appeared in sight from the right side of the road. it was in slow descent. it did not appear to be a conventional aircraft in terms of it flight characteristics. as we approached closer it wad noted to triangular in shape. there were three lights on each point of the triangle that were white in color. the center of the craft had a red light that flashed occasionally but without purpose. i could see the surface of the craft as well and it appeared dark and possibly reflective. the craft as it descended crossed the road and i made a uturn in my car to try to get a picture. it was then noted to be hovering at treetop level ( for about 10 seconds ) and was silent. i estimate the craft to be around the size of 3 sedan sized cars. after i had made my uturn and parked, the craft then started moving again and crossed the highway once more and all of a sudden disappeared. it did not descend or ascend, it just went out of sight completely. 

when i first saw the craft i thought it was plane due to a blinking light in the center, then noted it could be a helicopter as the light pattern didn't look typical. then noted it couldn't be a helicopter due to the fact it was traveling so smoothly.
content.summary: Trb 3 type craft that flew across hwy58 then hovered treetop level the flew back across road and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I lived in joplin, missouri at the time. i lived south of range line across highway 44. one night i was walking my two dogs right before the 10 o clock news. i had my ear phones on as i was walking the dogs. the sound was turned down very low so i can hear if anyone was getting close to me. i started walking down the street behind my house facing east.  i then look up at a 45 degree angle and see a chevron shaped craft appear out of no where. it was flying so close to the ground that i thought it was going to crash into the ground. it had a red light under it, and a blue light. one light on either side. the sighting lasted about 5 seconds and the craft appeared to have cloaked into the night sky. it didn't move across the horizon and disappear. it turned on some sort of cloaking device and disappeared.  i was terrified and grabbed the dogs and ran into the house after that. i got back to the house around 10:15 p.M.
content.summary: Large chevron object sighted over tree tops and disappeared in jopkin

content.detailedDescription: Riding in car and noticed bright lights coming from the ne - a red and blue constant light on either side, 3 white lights in the front.  lasted only about 20 seconds - moved from the ne to the sw.  was cloudy, so it must have been below cloud level.  lights eventually disappeared.
content.summary: Riding in car and noticed bright lights coming from the ne - a red and blue constant light on either side, 3 white lights in the front

content.detailedDescription: There was 2 places one was at the middle school and at the elementary school the one at the middle school was silent now sound at all it moving slow not slow slow but slow fast and the the lights were not flashing but one it was red that is all i saw before it went behind the tree line. the next one there was two at the elementary school it made sound it was like a humming yet a jet sound it flew right above me both of them it was shape like a triangle no flashing at all solid lights they were really close together i saw for about 15 sec when i lost it behind a building also it was really foggy and it was also during the blood moon night. that is all i got please help me find out what it was thanks.
content.summary: It was low to the grond about 500 yards

content.detailedDescription:
Friday oct 10,2014,1420.I just got on a lift bus at the v.A. hospital to go home.At 1425 approx.,i looked out the window at the sky and saw 2 silver ufos moving east to west.They went right over the v.A, hospital i only saw them for about 4 seconds and the bus went by some trees and i lost sight of them.
      when i saw them they were crisscrossing each others path and appeared to be tumbling.When we got some clearing again they were gone.
content.summary: 2 silver ufos crisscrossing each others path and tumbling.

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in the parking lot at 1155 virginia ave with two friends, we witnessed two bright lights in the northeastern sky. at first it appeared like they were two stars, but there was no twinkling. since we were extremely close to hartsfield-jackson airport we knew they could be airplanes, but they didn't move or have blinking navigation lights. 

we saw them right around 8:05pm. all three of us saw them. after looking at them for about 20 seconds, both twin lights faded slowly at the exact same time/pacing and then disappeared. we stared for about 5 more minutes and they didn't reappear. no clouds were in that part of the sky. 

there were two lights. exact same brightness. one was positioned around the 2 o'clock position of the other.
content.summary: Twin lights appeared and then faded out together in sync with each other

content.detailedDescription: Walking home with kids, picked up my son to look at the bright moon then realised two star like objects which looked like a part of a constellation, massively brighter than they should have been, pointed out to my wife and they slowly started to fade away to nothing. thinking back they seemed a lot closer in the sky than light years away where the stars would have been. really very very unnerving as we all watched them.
content.summary: Observed as star formation, really bright, realised they should not be there, then vanished slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was watering the grass in front of my apartment building at 815 sherman st in denver, colorado at about 3 a.M.. the date was during the time of the london summer olympics in the year 2012, so i think it was early august. 
i looked the east at the sky as i often look at the sky at night when i water the grass. 
across the street (east) of where i was standing there is a parking lot. positioned at the northeast corner of the lot is a tall evergreen like tree, it may be close to 100 feet tall. 
the star was positioned so that if  you looked above the tip of the tree you would see it. the star was larger than the pinpoints of light that most stars appear to be and i wondered at it. 
i began to be afraid it might be a ufo that would abduct me, as i had read about such things but had never had that happen to me. 
a young caucasian male was walking south across the street and i asked him if he could see the bright star. he said something but i couldn't hear him, he didn't speak very loudly, but he kept walking.  
i sent the star a mental/telepathic i guess you would say, question. i asked if it was sent from the christ (jesus) and if so would it blink off and back on. the star dimmed down and lit back up again. i then asked (again inaudibly/telepathically) if it was here for the rapture? it dimmed down and lit  up again twice. 
as i watched the star it ascended straight up slowly and then, south of its position, i noticed a smaller regular sized star, i guess you would call it; it also ascended but at an angle toward the larger star and they both went out of sight. 
i wrote down what i saw and made a note of the time and date as much as possible. there is a six-story apartment complex being built in the parking lot across from me now , october, 2014 so it may block out the evergreen tree later. i did tell a few others about this and managed to even report to the coast to coast am radio show to one of their investigators, linda multon howe on late night when i called their toll free number. i could easily draw what i saw. i also reported this to another ufo reporting website but i don't remember now who it was.
content.summary: Large star-like object communicated telepathically, ascended with smaller star-like object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my garden last night at 6pm. i was waiting till the sun sets with my camera hoping i would be able to get a photo of the apparent meteor shower overhead. i waited until the sun set at 6.22pm but still nothing. then out of the clouds shot a small grey disc with a small round bump on top. it had a yellow beam like light underneath. i immediately picked up my camera and took as many photos as i could until it disappeared. i managed to get 4 blurry photos of it. it was travelling much faster than a plane. i've already tried to send these pics into another website, but they said due to their resolution they wouldn't accept them. they then recommended this site. this "ufo" was very far away and very small and moving fast so the pics came out very blurry. i was hoping you could maybe enhance the images or something. it was just travelling in a straight line going up further into the clouds. i lost sight when it went into a cloud and didn't return.

p.S to see the ufo you really have to zoom in on the pictures.
content.summary: It was small, grey and had a yellow beam like light underneath it.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were outside and we saws this,mysterious light hovering maybe 300 feet away so we took out our phones and looked in and it was a alien ship of some sort .
content.summary: Cats and witness ran and shortly after cat stared showing up blood

content.detailedDescription: Highway 23 north virginia, kentucky state line. object appeared from east and slowly traveled west about two hundred feet above mountains until out of view. white center within light blue. a passenger with me observed this also. object never changed altitude or direction.
content.summary: Moderate steady horizontal flight.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard looking at stars with my telescope. i spoted an airplane so i stared at it until i sighted a starlike flying object circling around the airplane,then the object started following the airplane. at first i had thought it was a falling star but it was flying and not falling. i stared at it for a very long time,then i started getting flashback's of my life like the object was tracking my memory. i lost sight of it after the flashback's and it blinked then disappeared. i told my dad about it,he had said to report it which i'm doing now. i got in my house and felt drowsy a weird.
content.summary: A flying starlike light.
content.locationName: San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi

content.detailedDescription: Just stepped out back door to smoke and saw a small white light in the western sky and it appeared to be getting brighter,noticed that the light had no flashing lights and called my brother to come see the ufo was getting excited because this is not my first sighting and finally had a witness to an incident.The light was on a eastern directional path and were no sound coming from craft.The light traveled for maybe 10 seconds and then stopped and hovered for a approximately 5 seconds,then changed its path to a solid 90 directly up,diminishing in size,illumination,then finally color changed to red and disappeared.About thirty seconds lapsed and three bright flashes of light appeared over the house,approximately at a 10000 ft level then nothing.The light appeared to hover over auburn wa.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in western sky,central king county washinton state.

content.detailedDescription: Wife & i driving on hwy i-85 westbound. sky had multiple cloud formations. my wife held cell phone out window and was snapping shots as we rode.  after about 7 shots she stopped.  nothing was viable in sky as we rode.  after snapping pics we were looking at them. on the last photo we saw the 4 objects which looked like exhaust coming out of bottom.  one or two previous shots showed faint blurred images which i assume we're part of this 4 but not as close. never saw items, only appeared in photo. after seeing these my wife and i wondered how we had pics when nothing was visable. othere who have seen the pic are also wondering how this could be.
content.summary: Objects appeared in photo after taking

content.detailedDescription: I was just taken a lil drive to kill time. came to an intersection i 20 and mcart in fort worth texas. noticed some cool sunbeams coming out some clouds. thought... would be a cool pic. so right as the green light lit up,i snapped a quick pic... went home to upload it on instagram. started to crop it and zoomed in and to my amazement, there it was. disk shaped, zoom trail ufo.You can tell it was zooming out of the clouds. lucky shot i guess. hope this helps.
content.summary: Took a pic. and noticed i caught a disk shape ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way to wendover nevada. at 7:00 pm we were traveling west through the boniville salt flats.The mountain range behind wendover was approx. 50 mi away. clear blue sky .The sun had just dropped behind mountains allowing us a spectacular view.We suddenly noticed at approx. 45 degree up looking west, just beyond mountains, we clearly abserved. what looked like a white plume from a large rocket with a ball at the top..It sat there not moving.. after 20 min it moved slightly to left  then ascended straight up at great speed. the ball became completly visable turned red,the white plume followed staying the same size as when it hovered. we cant get this out of our minds.
content.summary: Observed plume of white gas shrouding a ball at top hovering in clear sky above mountain range, after 20 min went straight up till out of sight.
